name: 3D Ultra Lionel Traintown Deluxe Custom Layout

description: 3D Ultra Lionel Traintown Deluxe is a re-release of the original Traintown game. It was released in September 2000. Traintown Deluxe included a new feature, called the Layout Tinkerer, that allowed players to create and edit their own train track layouts, to replace the game's default levels.

These custom layouts are saved as RR files. In addition to creating their own RR files, players could also find, download, and use RR files shared on the internet. For example, the website WonSwap allowed players to upload and download RR files.
